See also: bus, bús, būs, buš, bus’, bus., Buś, Bus., and Appendix:Variations of "bus"

German[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /bʊs/
  • audio
    		(file)
  • Rhymes: -ʊs

Usage notes[edit]

The computer bus may also be pronounced as in English.

Noun[edit]

Bus m (genitive Busses, plural Busse)

  1. a bus (public transport)
  2. a bus (on a computer mainboard)
